Lack of attribution: The claim lacked any attribution, making it difficult to verify the source and credibility of the photograph.
Skepticism from readers: Many readers were rightfully skeptical of the image due to its crass and humorous nature, prompting further investigation into its authenticity.
Emergence of backstory: A backstory emerged to explain the image, addressing questions about its plausibility and providing additional context to assess its authenticity.
Digital manipulation: The expert's investigation revealed that the viral image was a digital manipulation of the original photograph, confirming that it was not an authentic depiction of the cheerleader's unfortunate incident.
